languages.text: "Наслаждайся новым обликом преображенного Футфола". {n}Инцендия устало прикрывает глаза, затем извлекает из кармана походный молитвенник друзианцев и погружается в чтение. Умиротворенная улыбка возникает на ее лице.{/n}

"Take joy in the sight of a new and transformed Footfall." {n}Incendia tiredly closes her eyes, then pulls out a small book of Drusian prayers and starts reading. A serene smile soon spreads across her face.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Наслаждайся новым обликом преображенного Футфола". {n}Инцендия устало прикрывает глаза, затем извлекает из кармана походный молитвенник друзианцев и погружается в чтение. Умиротворенная улыбка возникает на ее лице.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Take joy in the sight of a new and transformed Footfall." {n}Incendia tiredly closes her eyes, then pulls out a pocket book of Drusian prayers and starts reading. A serene smile soon spreads across her face.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

traits.locale_text: "Take joy in the sight of a new and transformed Footfall." {n}Incendia tiredly closes her eyes, then pulls out a small book of Drusian prayers and starts reading. A serene smile soon spreads across her face.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: “好好欣赏一下焕然一新的落脚港吧。”{n}因森蒂娅疲倦地闭上了双眼，随后拿出写满圣德鲁苏斯祷文的小册子，读了起来。她的脸上很快便绽放出了宁静的微笑。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Take joy in the sight of a new and transformed Footfall." {n}Incendia tiredly closes her eyes, then pulls out a small book of Drusian prayers and starts reading. A serene smile soon spreads across her face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “好好欣赏一下焕然一新的落脚港吧。”{n}因森蒂娅疲倦地闭上了双眼，随后拿出一本圣德鲁苏斯的祷文小册子读了起来。她的脸上很快便绽放出了宁静的微笑。{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: 「新しく生まれ変わったフットフォールの景色を、楽しむといい」{n}インセンディアは疲れたように目を閉じ、ドルシアンの祈りが書かれた小さな本を取り出して読み始めた。ほどなくして、落ち着いた笑みがその顔に浮かぶ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Take joy in the sight of a new and transformed Footfall." {n}Incendia tiredly closes her eyes, then pulls out a small book of Drusian prayers and starts reading. A serene smile soon spreads across her face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「新しく生まれ変わったフットフォールの景色を、楽しむといい」{n}インセンディアは疲れたように目を閉じ、ドルシアンの祈りが書かれた小さな本を取り出して読み始めた。ほどなくして、落ち着いた笑みがその顔に浮かぶ。{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: «Alégrese de ver un Paso nuevo y transformado». {n}Incendia cierra los ojos con cansancio, luego saca un pequeño libro de rezos drusianos y empieza a leer. Una sonrisa serena se dibuja en sus labios.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Take joy in the sight of a new and transformed Footfall." {n}Incendia tiredly closes her eyes, then pulls out a small book of Drusian prayers and starts reading. A serene smile soon spreads across her face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Alégrese de ver un Paso nuevo y transformado». {n}Incendia cierra los ojos con cansancio, luego saca un libro de rezos drusianos y empieza a leer. Una sonrisa serena se dibuja en sus labios.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Erfreut Euch an dem Blick eines neuen, verwandelten Footfall." {n}Incendia schließt müde die Augen, zieht ein kleines Buch mit drusianischen Gebeten hervor und beginnt zu lesen. Bald erscheint auf ihrem Gesicht ein friedliches Lächeln.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Take joy in the sight of a new and transformed Footfall." {n}Incendia tiredly closes her eyes, then pulls out a small book of Drusian prayers and starts reading. A serene smile soon spreads across her face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Erfreut Euch an dem Blick eines neuen, verwandelten Footfall." {n}Incendia schließt müde die Augen, zieht ein Notizbuch mit drusianischen Gebeten hervor und beginnt zu lesen. Bald erscheint auf ihrem Gesicht ein friedliches Lächeln.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: « Réjouissez-vous en voyant à quel point Castel a changé. » {n}Incendia ferme les yeux d'un air las, puis sort un carnet de prières drusiennes et se met à le lire. Un sourire serein apparaît bientôt sur son visage.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Take joy in the sight of a new and transformed Footfall." {n}Incendia tiredly closes her eyes, then pulls out a small book of Drusian prayers and starts reading. A serene smile soon spreads across her face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Réjouissez-vous en voyant à quel point Castel a changé. » {n}Incendia ferme les yeux d'un air las, puis sort un carnet de prières drusiennes et se met à le lire. Un sourire serein apparaît bientôt sur son visage.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Yeni ve dönüşüm geçirmiş bir Binliman manzarasının tadını çıkar." {n}İncendia, yorgun bir edayla gözlerini kapatıp ardından Drususçu dualar içeren küçük bir kitap çıkarıyor ve okumaya başlıyor. Bir süre sonra yüzüne huzurlu bir gülümseme yayılıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Take joy in the sight of a new and transformed Footfall." {n}Incendia tiredly closes her eyes, then pulls out a small book of Drusian prayers and starts reading. A serene smile soon spreads across her face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Yeni ve dönüşüm geçirmiş bir Binliman manzarasının tadını çıkar." {n}İncendia yorgun bir edayla gözlerini kapatıyor, ardından Drususçu dualar içeren küçük bir kitap çıkarıyor ve okumaya başlıyor. Bir süre sonra yüzüne huzurlu bir gülümseme yayılıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda
